section.p: This template represents the medications taken by the patient prior to and at the time of admission.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-16758, CONF:1098-16759, CONF:1098-32524 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Admission Medication template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15518)/@code="42346-7" Medications on Admission (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15519, CONF:1098-32152)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7701, CONF:1098-7702, CONF:1098-15520)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
SHALL conform to Admission Medication template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (kp)="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7698, R2.0=CONF:1098-7698)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7699, R2.0=CONF:1098-7699)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15518)/@code="42346-7" Medications on Admission (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15519, CONF:1098-32152)

SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7701, CONF:1098-7702, CONF:1098-15520)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:16758, CONF:16759 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.36"
Consol Admission Medication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode (kp)="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7698, R2.0=CONF:1098-7698)
Consol Admission Medication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7699, R2.0=CONF:1098-7699)
Consol Admission Medication SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15518)/@code="42346-7" Medications on Admission (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15519)

Consol Admission Medication SHALL contain [1..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7701, CONF:7702, CONF:15520) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
